A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the worst Star Wars Movie to date. If you were expecting any character continuity\, even from the newly introduced characters\, look elsewhere or for a major retcon. \nThe only good parts of it for me were Mark Hamill's performance despite how horribly the writing was for a very beloved character\, Luke Skywalker. Far too many elements or the film either make no sense in the universe or were just plain bad.\nThe solo star I give is to Mark Hamill and not to the film as I would give it a 0/5 if possible.
